definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Shen Zou operates mines in China that excavate fluorite and other minerals.
sentences.chinese: 申走在中国经营萤石矿，挖掘和其他矿物质。

sentences.english: On quenching, BZN- based cubic fluorite phase precipitates from the liquid phase.
sentences.chinese: 在淬火冷却时，液相中析出BZN系立方萤石相。

sentences.english: If you're looking for more of a value play that might take longer to generate momentum, go with Fluor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在找增值蓄势股，那就去买萤石。

sentences.english: I have two large mining companies, mainly barite and fluorite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司拥有两座大型矿山，主要是重晶石和萤石。

sentences.english: The fluorspar resources report of investigation has completed, and we are seeking for partners.
sentences.chinese: 情况萤石资源调查报告已完成，寻找合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Fluorite is common mineral assumed druses. The crystals are the same size of cube.
sentences.chinese: 萤石是一种常见呈晶簇产出的矿物。

sentences.english: Wuyi is the hometown of fluorite for the large amount, high quality.
sentences.chinese: 武义有“萤石之乡”之称，产量多，品位高，质量好。

sentences.english: The dewatering feature of the fluorite concentrate in Shizhuyuan Mine has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了柿竹园萤石精矿的脱水特性。

sentences.english: Fluorite is common mineral assumed druses.
sentences.chinese: 萤石是一种常见呈晶簇产出的矿物。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
